0.input:
Intent: Storage Devices
Bundle Items:
1. Silicon Power 32GB Firma ZN F80 USB 2.0 Flash Drive, Gray Aluminium (SP032GBUF2F80V1S)
2. Transcend 400X - 64 GB Compact Flash Memory Card TS64GCF400 (Blue)
3. Toshiba Canvio 750 GB USB 3.0 Basics Portable Hard Drive - HDTB107XK3AA(Black)
0.annotations: This bundle lacks functionality integration. The memory card implies that the bundle is for a user with a camera. Why buy a 32GB USB flash drive, when you could just buy multiple flash memory cards if the first 64GB memory card runs out of storage? Thus, the USB flash drive does not complement the bundle and the additional diversity of the USB flash drive does not contribute to enhancing the quality of the bundle. Adding a USB memory card reader would also be a great alternative which can help move the memory card information into the portable hard drive.

1.input:
Intent: Batteries
Bundle Items:
1. Wasabi Power Battery for Canon LP-E6 and Canon EOS 5D Mark II, EOS 5D Mark III, EOS 6D, EOS 7D, EOS 60D, EOS 60Da, EOS 70D
2. Belkin 3-Outlet Mini Travel Swivel Charger Surge Protector with Dual USB Ports, 5 Charging Outlets Total (1 AMP / 5 Watt)
3. Laptop/Notebook Battery for Dell Inspiron
4. Mophie Juice Pack Air Battery Case for iPhone 5 and 5S
1.annotations: The bundle lacks functionality integration as there is no clear way to connect all the items coherently. The Wasabi Power Battery implies the user has a camera, the Battery for Dell Inspiron requires that specific laptop, and the iPhone case implies the user has an iPhone 5. The items are not similar at all, and do not complement each other. The diversity of the bundle only adds confusion.

2.input:
Intent: Local area network for home or office
Bundle Items:
1. SANOXY® USB 6 LED PC Webcam Camera plus + Night Vision MSN, ICQ, AIM, Skype, Net Meeting and compatible with Win 98 / 2000 / NT / Me / XP / Vista
2. VideoSecu LCD Monitor TV Wall Mount Articulating Arm Bracket for most 12"-24", some up to 27" with VESA 100/75mm LED Flat Panel Screen TV ML10B 1E9
3. Etekcity® USB Wireless Wi-Fi Network Adapter with Dual 6 dBi Antennas - 802.11 B/G/N 300Mbps
2.annotations: This bundle is tailored to a user which specifically wants to setup a small video conferencing room. The TV wall mount is to hold a TV in place, the webcam is to let people in the online meeting see the users in the room, and the WiFi extender is used to ensure all participants in the meeting have good internet connection. The wall mount decreases the similarity and complementarity of the bundle as it specifically requires the user to require to mount a TV for a video conference meeting, whereas, if it were not present, it could be used for an individual home office setup. However, the diversity of the bundle is improved and it makes a lot of sense for specific users.

3.input:
Intent: Car sound system and radio set up
Bundle Items:
1. Scosche Automotive Wire Harness -1988-up GM Micro/Delco Antenna Adapter
2. Metra 70-1858 Radio Wiring Harness For GM 88-05 Harness
3. SD/MMC/USB/MP3 Wireless In Car FM Transmitter with Remote (Black)
3.annotations: The bundle has a clear intent, to setup a car sound and radio system in a General Motors vehicle. For the specific users in question, it makes a lot of sense, and all the items follow a common theme. The diversity of the Wireless remote actually increases the complementarity and overall value of the bundle.

4.input:

Bundle Items:

There is no discernable pattern, the items do not complement each other and the diversity only adds confusion to the bundle where there seems to not be any clear use for this bundle.

5.input:
Intent: Memory Related
Bundle Items:
1. WD My Book 1TB External Hard Drive Storage USB 3.0 File Backup and Storage
2. Sony 100DMR47SP 16x DVD-R 4.7GB Recordable DVD Media - 100 Pack Spindle
3. NEW Slim USB 2.0 External Slim USB 2.0 CD-ROM Drive for Toshiba Satellite U505-S2960PK U505-S2005PK 13.3-Inch series Laptop ( Pink )
5.annotations: It is quite easy to understand how the bundle would work, the 100 Pack Spindle allows you to record media and the USB CD-ROM drive allows you to connect to laptops which do not accept CDs. The External hard drive is also there to save all the data in a single place. The diversity adds to the value of the bundle, and although the hard drive may not be too similar to the CD related items, it does complement the bundle.

6.input:
Intent: upgrading personal computer desktop

Bundle Items:
1. Anker® Uspeed USB 3.0 PCI-E Express Card with 4 USB 3.0 Ports and 5V 4-Pin Power Connector for Desktops [VL805 Chipset]
2. WD My Book 1TB External Hard Drive Storage USB 3.0 File Backup and Storage
3. OSD Audio TSM-01-113 Full Motion Tilt and Swivel Wall Mount for 13-inch to 23-inch LCD TV
4. Sony 100DMR47SP 16x DVD-R 4.7GB Recordable DVD Media - 100 Pack Spindle
5. NEW Slim USB 2.0 External Slim USB 2.0 CD-ROM Drive for Toshiba Satellite U505-S2960PK U505-S2005PK 13.3-Inch series Laptop ( Pink )
6.annotations: It is hard to discern the specific user for the bundle. It has items that enhance the storage capacity of a desktop computer, while requiring the user also to want to mount a TV. Whilst this user could exist, the user would be extremely rare, and increasing the diversity of the bundle whilst requiring such a specific user only hurts the complementarity of the items. For instance, the user must want to mount a TV, whilst also want to have CD + backup storage whilst also want to add USB ports to a desktop computer. This would be exceedingly rare.

7.input:
Intent: assembling a desktop
Bundle Items:
1. Rosewill 5.25Inch SATA Trayless Hot Swap Mobile Rack for 3.5Inch SATA I/II/III HDD Components Other RX-C525 Black
2. Cisco-Linksys WPC54G Wireless-G Notebook Adapter

6. LIAN LI PC-B10B Black Advanced Mid Tower 5 x 5.25 4 x 3.5 ATX / M-ATX Computer Case
7. Iomega ZipCD 31025 8x4x32 Internal EIDE CDRW Drive
7.annotations: This bundle is very clearly for assembling the most versatile desktop possible, which can accept floppy drives and CDs, whilst also connecting the desktop to the internet. The diversity compensates for the dissimilarity of some items, as only together they contribute and complement each other to make the ultimate, versatile desktop setup.

8.input:

1. 7.1 Channel USB External Sound Card Audio Adapter
2. BestDealUSA External 3D USB 2.0 Virtual 7.1 Channel Audio Sound Card Adapter
3. Neewer USB EXTERNAL SOUND CARD 3D 5.1 AUDIO ADAPTER for PC
4. USB 2.0 Mic Speaker 5.1 Audio Sound Card ADAPTER
5. External 5.1 USB 3D Audio Sound Card Adapter for PC Desktop Notebook Laptop
42.annotations: The bundle has 4 USB Audio sound card adaptors which each serve the same function. Their use cases overlap and thus, they do not complement each other. The bundle lacks diversity for such a large bundle.

43.input:
Intent: To buy a usb 
Bundle Items:
1. Case Logic VHS-101 Portable Hard Drive Case (Black)
2. ASUS Transformer Infinity TF700T Mobile Docking - Champagne
3. 2 X Mini Usb Bluetooth V2.0 Edr Dongle Wireless Adapter
4. Bluetooth USB 2.0 Micro Adapter Dongle
5. Belkin 3-Outlet Mini Travel Swivel Charger Surge Protector with Dual USB Ports, 5 Charging Outlets Total (1 AMP / 5 Watt)
6. Toshiba Canvio 500 GB USB 2.0 Basics Portable Hard Drive E05A050BAU2XK (Black)
7. SANOXY MINI USB FEMALE TO MICRO B MALE ADAPTER [Electronics]
8. 16' Protrend PTHDMI16 v1.3 HDMI (M) to HDMI (M) Video/Audio Cable w/Gold-Plated Connectors (Blue)
43.annotations: The bundle has too broad of an intent and there is not clear function in which it aims to serve. The keyboard is specific to a TF700T tablet, but the other items have no specific connection to this device. The diversity clouds the true intent of the bundle, and the bundle lacks complementarity and similarity to a specific idea.

44.input:
Intent: Bluetooth Adapter
Bundle Items:
1. 2 X Mini Usb Bluetooth V2.0 Edr Dongle Wireless Adapter
2. Bluetooth USB 2.0 Micro Adapter Dongle
44.annotations: There are two wireless micro adapter dongles which serve the same purpose. I do not see any value in the bundle as someone who was already going to buy multiple bluetooth dongles would already do so with or without this bundle, and it would be hard to convince a user that a spare dongle is required. The bundle items are too similar and the bundle does not offer any useful diversity to complement it.

45.input:
Intent: different hard drive
Bundle Items:
1. Toshiba Canvio Connect 2TB Portable Hard Drive, Blue (HDTC720XL3C1)
2. Toshiba Canvio 750 GB USB 3.0 Basics Portable Hard Drive - HDTB107XK3AA(Black)
45.annotations: Two portable hard drives of different storage sizes could possibly serve a different function. Perhaps one is for storing large amounts of data, and one is to travel with and store lots of data for perhaps a photographer, before being transferred to the larger 2TB hard drive. Maybe it could be to backup a database. However, both functions are quite hard to justify as the items are so similar they do not complement each other well. Perhaps adding some diversity would resolve this issue.

47.input:

48.input:

Bundle Items:
1. Kensington 64032 Master Lock Universal Notebook Security Cable - Black
2. AmazonBasics 3-Button USB Wired Mouse (Black)
48.annotations: The Notebook security cable is for a specific function, to prevent theft. Thus, it is difficult to say that the wired mouse directly complements the security of the laptop, but rather complements the laptop. Perhaps increasing another item could both solve the complementarity problem and increase diversity whilst reinforcing the main idea of the bundle.

49.input:

Bundle Items:
1. Smart Touch Mini USB TouchPad Keyboard

49.annotations: The keyboard and mouse are the premier combo for laptops and computers. The items complement each other nicely though the value proposition could be improved by adding more diverse items.
